sentences.en: 420 workers have been ejected from their jobs with no warning.
sentences.cn: 420名工人在没有任何先兆的情况下被辞退。

sentences.en: CD CHANGER DEADLOCK ( CD JAMMED , CAN & apos ; T LOAD OR EJECT )
sentences.cn: CD机死锁 ( CD 阻塞, 不能装入或弹出 )

sentences.en: Eject the toxin of skin. keep the skin wets and anti - crimple.
sentences.cn: 皮肤排毒、消脂、保湿、 防 皱、祛斑.

sentences.en: He was asked to eject the video cassette from the vcr.
sentences.cn: 他被要求从录像机里把录像带拿出来.

sentences.en: Help to assimilation , eject toxin, eliminate intensity anxiety and tension.
sentences.cn: 提神醒脑,杀病菌,助消化,排毒, 消除焦虑紧张.

sentences.en: Officials used guard dogs to eject the protesters.
sentences.cn: 官员们用护卫犬驱走抗议者。

sentences.en: Plastic injection mould - coolant passages, eject pin and electrical heating holes.
sentences.cn: 塑胶射出模具 - 冷却水孔 、 射梢孔及电热孔.

sentences.en: Plastic injection mould , coolant passages, eject pin and electrical heating holes.
sentences.cn: 塑胶射出模具?冷却水孔 、 射梢孔及电热孔.

sentences.en: Queue to defer the eject until files and windows are closed.
sentences.cn: 关闭文件和窗口之前,将卷排入队列以推迟弹出.

sentences.en: Seconds passed. Now Stricklin reached for the eject handle.
sentences.cn: 就这样过了几秒钟,斯特里克林的手已经放在弹射拉手上了.

sentences.en: Skip Tracks Backwards and Forwards, Play, Pause, and Eject are all standard.
sentences.cn: 地, 播放, 暂停, 并弹出的所有标准.

sentences.en: The demonstrators were ejected from the hall.
The lizards can eject blood from its eyes.
sentences.cn: 这些蜥蜴能从眼睛里喷血.

sentences.en: This safety invention will eject the pilot from a burning plane.
sentences.cn: 这个安全装置会把飞行员从燃烧着的飞机中弹出.

sentences.en: To eject ( contents of the stomach ) through the mouth.
sentences.cn: 呕吐通过嘴喷出 ( 胃里的东西 )

sentences.en: To parachute from an aircraft; eject.
sentences.cn: 从飞机上用降落伞降落; 弹射出.

sentences.en: Try to eject the tape after it has been unmounted.
sentences.cn: 试图在卸载磁带时弹出磁带.

sentences.en: Two engines cut out and the plane started to eject fuel as it lost height.
sentences.cn: 两个发动机突然熄火，飞机在下降的同时开始喷出燃料。

sentences.en: Unable to eject the medium because it is in a drive.
sentences.cn: 因为媒体在驱动器中,无法将其弹出.

words.tran_cn: [机] 喷射器；驱逐者；推出器；排出器

trans.tran_en: to make someone leave a place or building by using force
